name: SIEGE (LooseJuice)
description:
Build exciting contraptions in 33 unique levels and transport a fragile payload to the finish line! There is also a sandbox mode where you can build whatever you like without limits!

Music by @packtionzt

WASD- Move Camera || LShift- Increase Camera Movement Speed

Scroll- Zoom In/Out || Space Bar- Toggle Play/Pause

LClick- Place Material || RClick- Clear Selection || Q/E Rotate Selection

R- Clear Level || Arrow Keys- Positive/Negative Actions || V- Toggle Follow Mode
